## [0.1.2] - 2016-08-14

### Fixed
- Moved `vue` to `peerDependencies`

### Changed
- Moved from `envify` to `loose-envify`

## [0.1.1] - 2015-12-26

### Changed
- Mininification now screws IE8

### Added
- Overview and use cases
- Npm badge

### Fixed
- Mixin example

## 0.1.0 - 2015-12-20

Initial release
